body: I was contracted by Next Gear Solutions to build custom dashboards that would display critical performance metrics across the entire customer journey. To accomplish this, I devised a unique implementation that assigned a distinct user ID to each prospect. This allowed us to query each API, including SalesForce, Active Campaign, Analytics, Website, and more, and combine the data into a cohesive data set. This enabled internal users to gain valuable insights into the effectiveness of specific marketing channels.
